name: Pentangle Internet Liited
tag_list: it-support, thame, computer-services, web-design, web-development, network-design
overview:
Pentangle Internet Limited are one of the foremost IT support companies in the South East of England.

With proven and certified expertise in server, network, laptop and desktop design and deployment, virtualisation, thin client computing and more, Pentangle bring Enterprise-level IT support practices to the SME.

Able to bring business value to companies of all sizes, but specialising in the SME market, Pentangle were formed in 2000 and have used the intervening years to spread the message about reliable, scalable, “it just works” computing.

This strategy has paid off, and during the challenging trading conditions seen recently we have seen the company double in size and revenue whilst maintaining our core values of reliability and an honest approach to corporate IT support.

Our skills range from 1st and 2nd-line Desktop/Laptop Support, Web Design/Build/Deploy, straight through to 3rd-line, Server Support, Internet and Network Design, Systems Integration, Consultancy and IT & Web Strategy creation, provision, or aid.

Going forwards, world domination is the obvious long term aim, but in the meantime we’ll try and give you an unbeatable customer experience for IT support.

So, if you’re looking for someone to manage your entire IT landscape, someone to provide a point-solution for a technology you’re currently unable to provide in-house, or someone to develop an end-to-end solution for a specific business problem you have, we’re able to fit into your company as though you’ve just hired a new IT department.
